participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and caring, Emily is passionate about healthy living and environmentally friendly practices.
participant_1.background: I had to eat an entire plate of broccoli once. I get distracted easily. I am a white person who is raising my child in an environmentally friendly way. I miss my family but I enjoy my job and my hobbies. My brother is an archaeologist.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, Jake enjoys exploring the outdoors and expressing himself through writing.
participant_2.background: I order my food on the phone so that I can stay in my pajamas the whole time. My favorite websites are the ones that help me learn about skiing and the mountains. My favorite thing to do is float the river. I am currently single. I ride my bicycle every day to keep fit and to clear my head so I can focus on my writing.

content.text: Hey there, good! How are you?
Doing well thanks! I love broccoli, I had to eat an entire plate of it once.
Oh no! That is terrible haha! I love broccoli too though, I order it on the phone so I can stay in my pajamas.
That's a great idea! I love to cook but I get distracted easily. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go float the river, it is so relaxing. I also ride my bicycle everyday to keep fit and to clear my head so I can focus on my writing.
That's awesome! I love to swim and hike, but I am not much of a writer. What do you write?
I write children's books, I love coming up with fun stories for kids to read.
That's so cool! I wish I could write. I'm just a simple office worker.
No worries, we all have our own talents. I admire people who can do so many different things!
Thanks, I appreciate that. I'm just glad I have a job I enjoy and a family who loves me.
That's all that matters! I'm sure your family is very proud of you.
They are, I'm lucky to have them.
Me too! I'm just glad I have the opportunity to talk to you today, thanks for chatting with me!
My pleasure, it was nice talking to you too!
